g.id: Here's the revised Figma AI prompt, focusing only on the UI aspects:---**Prompt:** Create a UI for an e-commerce product search page with the following features:1. **Search Functionality:** - Include a global search bar at the top, styled similarly to Google, where users can enter a product name. - Display search results in a clean grid layout on the homepage, with each product represented by a tile containing its image, name, and price.2. **Client-Side Sorting:** - Add a sorting dropdown to allow users to sort products by rating in ascending or descending order.3. **Client-Side Filtering:** - Implement a product filter feature to select products based on brand.4. **Responsive Design:** - Ensure the grid layout, search bar, and all other UI elements adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).5. **Lazy Loading:** - Implement lazy loading for product tiles, so the grid loads additional products dynamically as the user scrolls down the page.
Store Header Nav Bar with promotion
